meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tom Underwood James Meyers Erika Rogers Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4441.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Tom Underwood, an attorney from Haddon Heights, New Jersey
James Meyers, a student-teacher from Kingston, New York
Erika Rogers, a bartender from Indianapolis, Indiana (whose 2-day cash winnings total $25,000)

tr.td: BIOLO"G"
SINGERS ALSO KNOWN AS
PULITZER PRIZE CATEGORIES
AMERICAN WOMEN
TEST YOUR SNOW HOW
WORD HISTORY
